values: A surge is a sudden, large increase in something.
All at once, there was a surge of runners at the finish line.
n. (感情等)洋溢, 奔放浪涛般汹涌奔腾
vi. (人群等)蜂拥而出(感情等)洋溢, 奔放(波涛等)汹涌, 奔腾
时态:surged, surging, surges
